languages.text: "Но если вы всего лишь допускаете, что кто-то, кому небезразлична судьба Футфола, мог спустить на нижние палубы станции слух об агентах династии Чорда, желающих навести на Футфоле свои порядки... Тогда ваши подозрения обрели бы определенный смысл, как и неизбежная гибель данного человека от рук анверов".

"However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."
languages.original_text: "Но если вы всего лишь допускаете, что кто-то, кому небезразлична судьба Футфола, мог спустить на нижние палубы станции слух об агентах династии Чорда, желающих навести на Футфоле свои порядки... Тогда ваши подозрения обрели бы определенный смысл, как и неизбежная гибель данного человека от рук анверов".

traits.locale_text: "However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicious are entirely sensible, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

"However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicious are entirely sensible, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

"However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

"However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

"However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

languages.text: 「しかし、フットフォールのこの先を憂う何者かが、チョーダ家の諜報員がフットフォールに対する自分たちの権威を主張する動きがあるという噂を、下層部で広めた可能性を単に仄めかしているのなら…君の疑惑は実に筋が通っている。アンヴァースに襲われた男の死が避けられなかったのと同じだよ」
languages.original_text: "However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、フットフォールのこの先を憂う何者かが、チョーダ家の諜報員がフットフォールに対する自分たちの権威を主張する動きがあるという噂を、下層部で広めた可能性を単に仄めかしているのなら…君の疑惑は実に筋が通っている。アンヴァースに襲われた男の死が避けられなかったのと同じだよ」

languages.text: “不过，如果您只是暗指可能存在这样的可能性，怀疑某位在乎落脚港命运的人在底层区域散布流言，说库尔达的代理人打算在落脚港上维持他们的权威……那么，您的怀疑完全合乎逻辑。那个人死在安维尔帮手上，恐怕是不可避免的事情。”
languages.original_text: "However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

traits.locale_text: “不过，如果您只是暗指可能存在这样的可能性，怀疑某位在乎落脚港命运的人在底层区域散布流言，说库尔达的代理人打算在落脚港上维持他们得权威……那么，您的怀疑完全合乎逻辑。那个人死在安维尔帮手上，恐怕是不可避免的事情。”

languages.text: «No obstante, si se refiere a la posibilidad de que alguien que se preocupa por el destino de Paso pudiera haber creado un rumor en los bajos fondos de que los agentes de la casa Chorda buscaban hacer valer su autoridad sobre la estación... Pues, bueno, tus sospechas son totalmente lógicas, como lo fue la inevitable muerte de aquel hombre a manos de los Anvers».
languages.original_text: "However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

traits.locale_text: «No obstante, si se refiere a la posibilidad de que alguien que se preocupa por el destino de Paso pudiera haber creado un rumor en los bajos fondos de que los agentes de la casa Chorda buscaban hacer valer su autoridad sobre la estación... Pues, bueno, tus sospechas son totalmente lógicas, como lo fue la inevitable muerte de aquel hombre a manos de los Anvers».

languages.text: « Cependant, si vous suggérez simplement qu'une personne soucieuse du sort de Castel aurait pu faire courir le bruit dans les niveaux inférieurs que les agents de la maison Chorda cherchaient à asseoir leur autorité sur la station... vos soupçons seraient alors parfaitement logiques, tout comme la mort inéluctable de cet homme aux mains des Anver. »
languages.original_text: "However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, si vous suggérez simplement qu'une personne soucieuse du sort de Castel aurait pu faire courir le bruit dans les niveaux inférieurs que les agents de la maison Chorda cherchaient à asseoir leur autorité sur la station... vos soupçons seraient alors parfaitement logiques, tout comme la mort inéluctable de cet homme aux mains des Anver. »

languages.text: "Falls Ihr allerdings die Möglichkeit andeutet, dass jemand, dem an Footfalls Schicksal liegt, in den unteren Ebenen ein Gerücht lanciert hat, dass Agenten des Hauses Chorda ihre Autorität auf Footfall stärken wollen ... Nun, dann ist das eine vollkommen logische Vermutung, genau wie der unvermeidliche Tod dieses Mannes durch die Hand der Anvers."
languages.original_text: "However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr allerdings die Möglichkeit andeutet, dass jemand, dem an Footfalls Schicksal liegt, in den unteren Ebenen ein Gerücht lanciert hat, dass Agenten des Hauses Chorda ihre Autorität auf Footfall stärken wollen ... Nun, dann ist das eine vollkommen logische Vermutung, genau wie der unvermeidliche Tod dieses Mannes durch die Hand der Anvers."

languages.text: "Lakin Binliman'ın kaderini önemseyen birinin, alt seviyelerde Chorda Hanesi ajanlarının Binliman'da otorite kurma girişiminde bulunduğuna dair söylentiler çıkarmış olabileceğini ima ediyorsanız... O zaman şüpheleriniz mantıksal bir dayanağa oturuyor. Tıpkı adamın Anverların elinde kaçınılmaz şekilde can vermesi gibi."
languages.original_text: "However, if you are merely alluding to the possibility that someone who cares about Footfall's fate could have started a rumour on the lower levels that House Chorda's agents were looking to assert their authority on Footfall... Well, then your suspicions are entirely logical, as was the man's inevitable death at the hands of the Anvers."

traits.locale_text: "Lakin yalnızca, Binliman'ın kaderini önemseyen birinin, Chorda Hanesi ajanlarının Binliman'daki otoritelerini savunmak istediklerine dair düşük seviyelerde bir söylenti başlatmış olabileceği ihtimalini ima ediyorsanız... Eh, o zaman şüpheleriniz de adamın Anverlara kurban gitmesi de aynı mantık çerçevesine oturuyor."
